Board of Education, N.Y.C.

720033f-a.text:
View 1:
Gouveneur Street west side looking
northwards from Monroe Street

June 24, 1929.

View 2:
Gouveneur Street, south west corner
and Monroe Street, looking south east
across clearing.

P.L.Speer.
August 14, 1939.

721687f-b.text:
Monroe Street, east across Gouverneur Street, showing the demolition for the government sponsered public housing project, the USHA "Vladeck Houses". The cleared blockfront in the fofeground is the narrow frontage from Gouverneur to Scammel Street's.
June 23, 1939
No's. 1-2-3
P. L. SPERR

2: April 25, 1939

721690f-a.text:
Monroe Street, north side, east across Gouverneur Street, showing the site of the future USHA "Vladeck Houses" during demolition. The cleared block front in the center is the narrow Gouverneur to Scammel Street frontege. In the background appears the cables
of the Williamsburg Bridge.
June 24, 1939
P. L. sPERR
